text: Hussain Niyaz Mohamed (born 19 March 1987) nicknamed "Bokury", is a Maldivian footballer who plays as a winger for Maziya and Maldives national team. ==International goals== :Scores and results list the Maldives goal tally first. {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" ! # !! title: Hussain Niyaz Mohamed
